description:
Practice your simple math operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication & division) with Blackboard / Math!

Getting better at simple math operations has never been this easy!

(serious voice-over) This training game may increase you mental alertness.

If you have issues, please click on the Support button (in the App Catalor or in the About menu) before leaving a negative review. Most issues can be solved if we can work it together. You can also tweet your questions to @ukabu.

Some complains about how numbers appears when taping the keypad. The "Typing Direction" option in the main screen allows you to choose how they appear. The leftmost option makes numbers appear from right to left... Tapping 1, 2, 3 will result in 321. The rightmost option makes numbers appear from left to right... Tapping 1, 2, 3 will result in 123.

What's new:
- Added a bit of variety in congrats animations (more to come),
- Fixed: blank screen appearing on some circumstances,
- Eliminated swiping animation before displaying congrats/answer,
- Support button now links to Ukabu's PreCentral forum.

Open sourced under the Apache License, version 2.0. Source is available on https://github.com/ukabu/blackboardMath
